## getValue() function

Safely returns value from object property using string expression

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getValue(object: any, expression: string): any;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  object | <code>any</code> | Object which property value will be obtained |
|  expression | <code>string</code> | Expression for obtaining value |

<b>Returns:</b>

`any`
